TV_Add().description: Adds a new item to the TreeView and returns its unique Item ID number (or 0 upon failure).

TV_Delete().description: Deletes the specified item or all items.

TV_GetChild().description: Returns the ID number of the specified item's first/top child (or 0 if none).

TV_GetCount().description: Returns the total number of items in the control.

TV_GetNext().description: Returns the ID number of the next item below the specified item (or 0 if none).

TV_Get().description: Returns the ID number of the specified item if it has the specified attribute.

TV_GetParent().description: Returns the specified item's parent as an item ID.

TV_GetPrev().description: Returns the ID number of the sibling above the specified item (or 0 if none).

TV_GetSelection().description: Returns the selected item's ID number.

TV_GetText().description: Retrieves the text/name of the specified ItemID and stores it in OutputVar.

TV_Modify().description: Modifies the attributes and/or name of an item.
